channel.title: Vesta's Longsword? No special, Doesn't register item, HELP!
channel.description:
[size=12pt]I have the model for vesta long...[/size] [size=12pt]Pic:[/size] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/iz5h8w.jpg[/img]
[size=12pt]Stances work...[/size] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/15p0i76.jpg[/img]
Help me please?

item.title: Vesta's Longsword? No special, Doesn't register item, HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Mod-Vlad Mod-Vlad-
item.description:
@Mod-Vlad wrote:

Add vesta’s longsword to item.cfg sir.
Open item.cfg>search any longsword line>copy it>paste it under previous item>put the item ID of your Vesta’s Longsowrd>Change the name of item>Change Price and bonuses>Close>Compile(this may not be required)>Run and test.
Hope I’ve helped.

Read full topic
item.source: Vesta's Longsword? No special, Doesn't register item, HELP!

item.title: Vesta's Longsword? No special, Doesn't register item, HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Ferity Ferity
item.description:
@Ferity wrote:

You have to add the item to Item.cfg source sided.
I guess the VLS does not have any bonuses yet.
The special hit also must be coded in Clickingmost.java/Special.java (Not sure…) and Client.java, just search the Spec models in the web.

Read full topic
